Arth is a 1982 film directed by Mahesh Bhatt.  
It features a memorable soundtrack by Ghazals duo and eternal voice of Jagjit Singh and Chitra Singh.

Love to see this emotional musical movie again and again .... but
but Video quality is not good

but thanks again !
